channel.title: Guitar on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Guitar on Martin's Blog

item.title: Guitar shopping - Cort EVL Z2
item.description: The day was good, the sun was up and the road was clear, well just to Haverfordwest golf club, after that I got stuck behind the never-ending queue of cars driving 40mph on a 60mph road :-) I’m not bitter. Really I am not. My final destination was Cardiff and Bristol although the latter was more as an alternative as I could not find any good music shops there over the internet.
